doc.name: ChordParser
doc.description: The Chord parser receives OSC information regarding the Chords and builds a sequence of chord objects. It both (i) ensures all chords that exist in the specification have been received and if so, (ii) outputs a sequence of org.ptolemy.machineImprovisation.Chord objects, in sequence order.
doc.author: Ilge Akkaya
doc.port: Index of chord in the global chord sequence.
Termination input to end chord sequence.
An array of ordered chord objects.
